FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: "Living side by side with the Elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order
"Living side by side with the Elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order
"Jetzt, da ich nun so lange unter Elfen gelebt habe, weiß ich, dass wir der selben Göttin dienen.“ -Kolbjörn, Altdruide des Juniperordens
